content: francesca caricato the knitting planet s ravelry store hoshi s sweater a knitting pattern for cats what it is and what you need… if your cat is always cold if it is a sphynx or devon rex breeds that have little or no fur you could knit a sweater for it i did it for my cat in fact a few years ago i made a dress for hoshi here https //www ravelry com/patterns/l ibrary/hoshidress but in the meantime she has grown up and i thought of writing a new pattern with a larger fit this new size fits regular cats if your cat is a big one my advice is to use larger needles to grow up with final
